abstract: Microsoft buys AdECN, an ad exchange to give a boost to its online advertising business.
snippet: Microsoft buys AdECN, an ad exchange to give a boost to its online advertising business.
lead_paragraph: If imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, the beleaguered folks at Yahoo must have a reason to feel good today. Following that company’s acquisition of advertising exchange Right Media, Microsoft said it too would purchase an ad exchange, AdECN.
